title: I don't really feel like Bronze, Silver, Gold etc. are a display of your skill level.
body:
It genuinely feels like a grind.  It reminds me of leveling a character in an MMO, where in order to advance you have to put in a lot of hours.

When I get promoted, I never get that feeling that I got promoted because I genuinely improved at the game, I feel like it's because I played enough games to where I eventually hit a luck streak during promo's.  IDK.

I know really skilled players can climb faster, but I think for a large majority of people from Bronze 5 to Gold 5 (highest I've ever been), the main difference is who played the most games consecutively.
